_exec_summary.SummaryText:
Sunoco Partners Marketing & Terminals, LP - Glenpool Terminal was constructed in accordance with the National Fire Protection Association (NFPA Code) #58 (2014 Edition) for Liquefied Petroleum Gas Storage, and it is the facility's policy to adhere to all applicable federal, state and local laws/codes. It is the intent of the Glenpool Terminal to incorporate the most recent construction and procedural guidance (NFPA #58-2014 Edition) into this process.



Sunoco Partners Marketing & Terminals, LP - Glenpool Terminal is a bulk petroleum storage and distribution facility that includes Butane blending operations. The Risk Management Plan (RMP) covers the associated piping and six (6) 90,000 gallon (water capacity) storage vessels that contain Butane.



Sunoco Partners Marketing & Terminals, LP - Glenpool Terminal complies with the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency's (EPA) Accident Prevention Rules (40 CFR Part 68 Subpart D), the Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) Process Safety Management (PSM) standard (29 CFR Part 1910.119) along with its fourteen (14) compliance elements, and all applicable state and local laws and regulations. The Butane system is designed, constructed, and maintained in accordance with NFPA #58 and the manufacturer's (Sunoco Partners Marketing & Terminals, LP) specifications.



In the event of an emergency involving the Sunoco Partners Marketing & Terminals, LP - Glenpool Terminal, it is the policy of the facility to initially contact the Glenpool Fire Department and request their assistance. The facility emergency response plans are coordinated with fire department and the County Emergency Management.  



In an effort to improve and promote system safety, Sunoco Partners Marketing & Terminals, LP looks for, and seeks employee input, on process safety improvements. Additionally, the Glenpool Fire Department is contacted regarding participation in site emergency response drills. Additional actions include consolidating separa
te system inspection checklists for ease of completion.
